mapper.sql: ID, CREATED_AT, NAME, IS_DELETED, URL, IS_FINISH, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_ID, UNDO_TYPE, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_BMS_TODOS (NAME, IS_DELETED, URL, IS_FINISH, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_ID, UNDO_TYPE, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFinish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_SES_BMS_TODOS
ID,
CREATED_AT,
NAME,
IS_DELETED,
URL,
IS_FINISH,
CLASS_NAME,
CLASS_ID,
UNDO_TYPE,
SENDER_ID,
RECEIVER_ID,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_BMS_TODOS
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FINISH = #{isFinish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_NAME = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_ID = #{classId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNDO_TYPE = #{undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SENDER_ID = #{senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_BMS_TODOS set CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_FINISH = #{isFinish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_ID = #{classId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNDO_TYPE = #{undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SENDER_ID = #{senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT bt.*, BU.REL_NAME AS SENDER_NAME FROM T_SES_BMS_USER bu INNER JOIN T_SES_BMS_TODOS bt ON BT.SENDER_ID = BU."ID" WHERE BU.ORG_ID IN #{ids,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND BT.IS_DELETED = 0 AND BT.IS_FINISH =#{todos.isFinish,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND BT.UNDO_TYPE = #{todos.undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY UNDO_TYPE
SELECT UNDO_TYPE FROM T_SES_BMS_TODOS GROUP BY UNDO_TYPE ORDER BY UNDO_TYPE
